t = int(raw_input())
from itertools import repeat
for _ in xrange(t):
    raw_input()
    arr = map(int, raw_input().split())
    dep = map(int, raw_input().split())
    changes = sorted(zip(arr, repeat(1)) + zip(dep, repeat(-1)))
    m = 0
    g = 0
    curtime = -1000
    for event in changes:
        time, gc = event
        if curtime > 0 and curtime != time:
            m = max(m, g)
        g += gc
        curtime = time
    print m
